message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. How about $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to go a bit lower? How about $130?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about $142.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Can you try to go a bit lower? How about $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $140?
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my target price. How about $137.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $138?
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $136, but no more. This is my final offer.
